thread.title: Saxophone maker braces for ownership change

title: Saxophone maker braces for ownership change
text:
Saxophone maker braces for ownership change 9:20am GMT - 01:25 
The logo is over a century old but it's the end of an era for this French manufacturer which produces what are considered among the best saxophones in the world as it prepares to hand over the reins of the family business to an investment fund. Francis Maguire reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
